name: hugo-site
description: This is the repository from which the Hugo-generated version of https://www.brycewray.com/ is built.
author: Bryce Wray

scripts.move-excerpts: move-cli public/posts/index.xml public/index-excerpts.xml && move-cli public/posts/index.json public/index-excerpts.json
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development npm-run-all clean cleancss postcsscli --parallel dev:hugo dev:postcss
scripts.start:debug: NODE_ENV=development npm-run-all clean cleancss postcsscli --parallel devdebug:hugo dev:postcss
scripts.build:prelim: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all clean cleancss postcsscli prod:hugo
scripts.testbuild: npm-run-all clean cleancss build:prelim move-excerpts --parallel testbuildexec:hugo dev:postcss
scripts.testbuildpf: npm-run-all build:prelim move-excerpts testbuild:search --parallel testbuildexec:hugo dev:postcss
